channel.title: Need some help Please! :(
channel.description:
Alright, I downloaded the Hyperion Server in serverdownloads, its one where you need to use eclipse to run it. I get errors when i ues the run.bat and when i try to run it through eclipse as well. I run the Server First then the client as your suppose to.
When i run the Run.bat i get this error:
[code]Mar 13, 2010 1:49:00 AM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:00 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:01 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:02 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:02 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Mar 13, 2010 1:49:03 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:03 AM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:03 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:07 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. Mar 13, 2010 1:49:07 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:08 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 14974 object definitions. Mar 13, 2010 1:49:08 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:11 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 1376518 objects. Mar 13, 2010 1:49:11 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:21 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loaded 11525 definitions Mar 13, 2010 1:49:26 AM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: d:\npcDe finitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (Access is denied) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(FutureTask.java:222) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(FutureTask.java:83) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(Blockin gExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: d:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (Acc ess is denied) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:177) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:102) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(FileWriter.java:61) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCDefinition.init(NPCDefinition.java:107) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$4.call(World.java:139) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:303) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:138) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(ThreadPoolExec utor.java:886) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor .java:908) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Mar 13, 2010 1:49:26 AM org.hyperion.rs2.content.DialogueLoader init INFO: Loaded 17 dialogue sets. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
When I use Eclipse to run it i get this error:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/hyperion/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.hyperion.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: org.hyperion.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
So if someone could help me, that would be great!

item.title: Need some help Please! :(
item.dc:creator: @12igon8 12igon8
item.description:
@12igon8 wrote:

yup looks like a major typo

@djvawter wrote:

im not sure completely, but it looks as if you have possibly misspelled something? ummâ€¦right click on run.bat and copy all of it and post what it says on here.

item.title: Need some help Please! :(
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

Alright, I downloaded the Hyperion Server in serverdownloads, its one where you need to use eclipse to run it. I get errors when i ues the run.bat and when i try to run it through eclipse as well. I run the Server First then the client as your suppose to.

When i run the Run.bat i get this error:

Mar 13, 2010 1:49:00 AM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:00 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:01 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:02 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:02 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Mar 13, 2010 1:49:03 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:03 AM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:03 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:07 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. Mar 13, 2010 1:49:07 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:08 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 14974 object definitions. Mar 13, 2010 1:49:08 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:11 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 1376518 objects. Mar 13, 2010 1:49:11 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Mar 13, 2010 1:49:21 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loaded 11525 definitions Mar 13, 2010 1:49:26 AM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: d:\npcDe finitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (Access is denied) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(FutureTask.java:222) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(FutureTask.java:83) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(Blockin gExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: d:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (Acc ess is denied) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:177) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:102) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(FileWriter.java:61) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCDefinition.init(NPCDefinition.java:107) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$4.call(World.java:139) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:303) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:138) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(ThreadPoolExec utor.java:886) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor .java:908) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Mar 13, 2010 1:49:26 AM org.hyperion.rs2.content.DialogueLoader init INFO: Loaded 17 dialogue sets. Press any key to continue . . .

When I use Eclipse to run it i get this error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/hyperion/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.hyperion.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: org.hyperion.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

So if someone could help me, that would be great!
